Test Name: MYD88 L265P Somatic Gene Mutation, DNA Allele-Specific PCR
Specimen Type: Peripheral blood, bone marrow aspirate, or formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue
Purpose: To detect the presence of the MYD88 L265P somatic gene mutation associated with certain lymphomas and hematologic malignancies.
Container: EDTA tubes for blood and bone marrow; FFPE tissue blocks for tissue specimens
Equipment: PCR cycler, real-time PCR machine, microcentrifuge, vortex mixer, pipettes with filter tips, gel electrophoresis apparatus, UV transilluminator
